name: Sector 0 Left Wall
description: Left boundary wall for isometric diorama - Neo-Tokyo building facade.
visualPrompt: Side view of Neo-Tokyo cyberpunk building facade, tall skyscraper wall with neon signs, holographic advertisements, exposed pipes and air conditioning units, fire escapes, rain-streaked windows reflecting cyan and magenta neon lights, dark industrial aesthetic, night scene, vertical composition, anime cel-shaded style, no characters, dramatic lighting from right side.
